title: Unspecified error has occured
body: I seem to be running onto this problem more and more. And the more i check on the forums i can't seem to find a solution. I notice however that the riot staff themselves don't do a hell of a lot to assist in this problem. Is there anyone out there who can help me solve this?

replies.body: @Agent Mindstar the trouble shooting page is pretty vague and is little to no help. are you guys actually able to help or do you just leave it up  to the oce community to solve the problems?

Hey

The patching issues page does usually cover players who are having some of the more common issues that can mess with the patching process.

That said, it doesn't always fix the problem, so if that is the case for you, it might be a good idea to [send in a support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) (there's a link near the top of the support page), and one of our Player Support team should be able to help you dive into specifics.

If you need help - we're here for you, and if you feel you're not getting the right kind of help I'd love to hear more about how we could be better at it :)

Cheers
Mindstar

Hey there,

The patching issues support article linked below (by Mindstar) should be able to help you resolve this issue.

Specifically I would recommend starting with the "[Force a Repatch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq4)" section of that article.
i ahve run through all trouble shooting and still no progress :P

Hi

Sorry to hear you're having issues - have you guys checked out the [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) page for suggestions?

Cheers
Mindstar
Same thing with me what the hell is going on :/{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
Yeah, I'm not sure honestly. The exact same thing keeps happening to me and I don't know how to fix it.
